article.title: Tactical Communications Group Contract To Provide Navy Pilot Training
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Tactical Communications Group (TCG) has been awarded a U.S. Navy contract to provide realistic Link 16 training software for the Navy's West Coast EA-6B/EA-18G training squadronÂ at Whidbey Island Washington Naval Air Station. Under the contract, the company will train pilots and ground operational personnel on datalink tactics, techniques, and procedures using TCG's ground tactical datalink system.
